title: Ep. 198 - The Modern Day Blackface
description:
Today on the Matt Walsh Show, Democrats accuse Republicans of “sabotaging” the green new deal… by voting on it. Also, with “drag queen story hours” popping up at libraries across the country, here’s my question: isn’t drag a blackface-style mockery of womanhood? How have drag queens escaped criticism? Finally, a college newspaper tells white boys to “stop talking.” Date: 02-14-2019
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
